projectGridLines.title: Community lifestyle application
projectGridLines.description:
Project Title : Community Lifestyle Application

Project Brief : A one-stop solution to enhance the residential community living experience for our end customers.

Broad Domain of the Project: Product Management

Discipline of Study: Open to all disciplines

Skill Sets (Minor Certificates): Brand and Product Management


A one stop solution to enhance the residential community living experience for our End customers.

?Problem Statement:

Enhancing Spotify's Social Features and Community Engagement

Spotify aims to be the leading platform for music streaming by not only offering personalized music experiences but also fostering a strong community among its users. While Spotify has features like shared playlists and collaborative listening, there is a significant opportunity to enhance its social capabilities and community engagement. Your task is to propose a new feature or an enhancement to an existing feature that will significantly improve the social experience and community engagement on Spotify.

Key Components to Include:

  1. Problem Identification:
  • Conduct research to identify current pain points or gaps in Spotify's social features and community engagement.
  • Use data, user feedback, and competitor analysis to support your findings.
  1. Proposed Solution:
  • Describe your proposed feature or enhancement in detail.
  • Explain how this solution addresses the identified problem and enhances the user experience.
  • Include wireframes or mockups to visualize your proposal.
  1. User Personas:
  • Develop at least two user personas that would benefit from your proposed solution.
  • Explain how your solution caters to their needs and preferences.
  1. Impact and Metrics:
  • Define the key performance indicators (KPIs) that will measure the success of your proposed feature.
  • Explain how you would track and analyze these metrics post-launch.
  1. Implementation Plan:
  • Outline a high-level roadmap for implementing your proposed solution.
  • Identify potential challenges and risks, and suggest mitigation strategies.
  • Provide a timeline for development, testing, and launch.
  1. Competitive Analysis:
  • Analyze similar features or approaches used by Spotify's competitors.
  • Highlight what sets your proposal apart and how it offers a unique value proposition.
  1. User Testing Plan:
  • Design a plan for user testing your proposed feature.
  • Describe the methodologies you would use and the type of feedback you aim to gather.

Submission Requirements:

  • Format: PDF or Word document, maximum of 10 pages (excluding wireframes/mockups).
  • Deadline: [Insert Deadline]
  • Submission Method: [Insert Submission Instructions]

Evaluation Criteria:

  • Problem-Solution Fit: How well does the proposed solution address the identified problem?
  • Innovation: Is the proposal creative and does it offer a unique approach to enhancing social features and community engagement?
  • Feasibility: How realistic and implementable is the proposed solution?
  • Clarity and Structure: Is the document well-organized, clearly written, and easy to follow?
  • Data-Driven Insights: Does the candidate use data and research effectively to support their proposal?
  • User-Centric Approach: How well does the proposal consider the needs and preferences of Spotify users?

Good luck! We look forward to seeing your innovative ideas to enhance Spotify's social features and community engagement.

projectGridLines.title: Sales Enabler application
projectGridLines.description:
Project Title: Sales Enabler Application

Project Brief: An application and dashboard to maximize leads utilization and manage digital marketing strategy.

Broad Domain of the Project: Product Management

Discipline of Study: Open to all disciplines

Skill Sets (Minor Certificates):

  • Brand and Product Management
  • Foundations of Business Analytics



Assignment Overview:

This assignment is designed to evaluate your problem-solving skills, creativity, and understanding of product management principles within the context of a real-world scenario at Spotify. You will be asked to propose enhancements to Spotify's user experience, supported by research, strategic thinking, and a clear execution plan.

Problem Statement:

Enhancing Spotify's User Experience for Music Discovery

Spotify has always aimed to be the leading platform for music streaming by providing personalized and engaging experiences for its users. One key area of focus is music discovery â€“ helping users find new music that they will love. Despite various features like Discover Weekly, Release Radar, and personalized playlists, there is still room for improvement. Your task is to propose a new feature or an enhancement to an existing feature that will significantly improve the music discovery experience on Spotify.

Key Components to Include:

  1. Problem Identification:
  • Conduct research to identify current pain points or gaps in Spotify's music discovery experience.
  • Use data, user feedback, and competitor analysis to support your findings.
  1. Proposed Solution:
  • Describe your proposed feature or enhancement in detail.
  • Explain how this solution addresses the identified problem and enhances the user experience.
  • Include wireframes or mockups to visualize your proposal.
  1. User Personas:
  • Develop at least two user personas that would benefit from your proposed solution.
  • Explain how your solution caters to their needs and preferences.
  1. Impact and Metrics:
  • Define the key performance indicators (KPIs) that will measure the success of your proposed feature.
  • Explain how you would track and analyze these metrics post-launch.
  1. Implementation Plan:
  • Outline a high-level roadmap for implementing your proposed solution.
  • Identify potential challenges and risks, and suggest mitigation strategies.
  • Provide a timeline for development, testing, and launch.
  1. Competitive Analysis:
  • Analyze similar features or approaches used by Spotify's competitors.
  • Highlight what sets your proposal apart and how it offers a unique value proposition.
  1. User Testing Plan:
  • Design a plan for user testing your proposed feature.
  • Describe the methodologies you would use and the type of feedback you aim to gather.

Submission Requirements:

  • Format: PDF or Word document, maximum of 5 pages (excluding wireframes/mockups).
  • Deadline: [Insert Deadline]
  • Submission Method: [Insert Submission Instructions]

Evaluation Criteria:

  • Problem-Solution Fit: How well does the proposed solution address the identified problem?
  • Innovation: Is the proposal creative and does it offer a unique approach to music discovery?
  • Feasibility: How realistic and implementable is the proposed solution?
  • Clarity and Structure: Is the document well-organized, clearly written, and easy to follow?
  • Data-Driven Insights: Does the candidate use data and research effectively to support their proposal?
  • User-Centric Approach: How well does the proposal consider the needs and preferences of Spotify users?

Good luck! We look forward to seeing your innovative ideas to enhance Spotify's music discovery experience.
